markers.marker: DMG apologizes for her behavior.
DMG references using an attack.
DMG talks about riding a broom.
DMG mentions eye candy.
DMG references the fact that it's a card game.
DMG talks about Revy's cigarette.
DMG claps back when Asuna chastises her for losing her skirt.
DMG references her use of dark magic.
DMG actually cusses. Only used during orgasm.
DMG mentions that she uses a hair removal spell down there.
DMG talks about the heart of the cards
DMG references Life Points, which is part of the Duel Monsters card game.
DMG talks about her own luck.
DMG talks about using magic.
DMG questions Asuna's hair color.
DMG makes a Queen of Hearts joke.
DMG references a classic magicians act.
DMG references a spell card.
DMG talks about smoking, which she hates.
DMG talks about using a spell.
DMG refers to the fact that she is a Spellcaster-type monster.
DMG makes a Star Wars reference.
DMG can't believe Aimee's method of stripping.
DMG references another Duel Monsters card.
DMG references the fact that in the game, she requires a tribute to be summoned.
DMG talks about tricks because she's a magician.
DMG talks about wands, usually as a euphamism for penis.
